title: Bug 120315: Incorrect handling of display property in new PDF emitter
description: The display property of an item is not taking effect in the new PDF emitter.
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it does not hide the item in the new PDF emitter.
EB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', the item should be hidden in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Open the 'Properties' view.
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none'.
4. Generate a PDF file using the new emitter.
